scripts.dotnet:generate: npm install && coverage-tests generate ./configuration --pascalizeTests --strict && mv ./test/Selenium/coverage/generic/*Native*.cs ./test/Appium/coverage/generic && mv ./test/Selenium/coverage/generic/Appium*.cs ./test/Appium/coverage/generic
scripts.dotnet:generate:local: npm install && coverage-tests generate ./configuration --pascalizeTests --strict --tests ./coverage-tests.js && mv ./test/Selenium/coverage/generic/*Native*.cs ./test/Appium/coverage/generic && mv ./test/Selenium/coverage/generic/Appium*.cs ./test/Appium/coverage/generic
scripts.dotnet:generate:win: npm install && coverage-tests generate ./configuration --pascalizeTests --strict && move /Y .\test\Selenium\coverage\generic\*Native*.cs .\test\Appium\coverage\generic && move /Y .\test\Selenium\coverage\generic\Appium*.cs .\test\Appium\coverage\generic
scripts.dotnet:run:parallelOld: cd .. && dotnet test -f netcoreapp3.1 Eyes.Sdk.DotNet_Travis.sln --filter Generated --logger "junit;LogFilePath=./coverage-test-report.xml"
scripts.dotnet:report: [ "$TEST_REPORT_SANDBOX" = "False" ] && npm run dotnet:report:prod || npm run dotnet:report:sandbox
